channel.title: CVE Feed for Echelon -- SmartServer 1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Echelon -- SmartServer 1

item.title: CVE-2018-8855|2024-09-17T01:10:42.995Z -- echelon -- smartserver%201
item.description: Echelon SmartServer 1 all versions, SmartServer 2 all versions prior to release 4.11.007, i.LON 100 all versions, and i.LON 600 all versions. The devices allow unencrypted Web connections by default, and devices can receive configuration and firmware updates by unsecure FTP.

item.title: CVE-2018-8859|2024-09-17T03:48:36.377Z -- echelon -- smartserver%201
item.description: Echelon SmartServer 1 all versions, SmartServer 2 all versions prior to release 4.11.007, i.LON 100 all versions, and i.LON 600 all versions. An attacker can bypass the required authentication specified in the security configuration file by including extra characters in the directory name when specifying the directory to be accessed. This vulnerability does not affect the i.LON 600 product.
